scripts.setup: npm install && echo '✅ Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development server'
scripts.setup:check: echo '🔍 Checking environment setup...' && node -e "console.log('Node.js:', process.version); console.log('npm:', process.env.npm_version || 'Unknown')"
scripts.setup:env: echo '📝 Please create .env file with SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_ANON_KEY'
scripts.build: echo '✅ No build step required for this Node.js project'
scripts.clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning node_modules...' && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.clean:win: echo '🧹 Cleaning node_modules...' && rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:3000/ping || echo '❌ Server not running'
scripts.open: echo '🌐 Opening test page...' && start http://localhost:3000/test-page.html
scripts.open:api: echo '📡 Opening API docs...' && start http://localhost:3000/employees
scripts.info: echo '📋 Project: Leave Management System' && echo '🚀 Development: npm run dev' && echo '🧪 Testing: npm run test' && echo '🌐 Test Page: http://localhost:3000/test-page.html'
